creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: torque made from one hollow hoop of silver; hoop ends with cones on both sides; hoop has double-fish symbol in a medallion at the center, one dragon is seen on either side of it; fish and birds surround the dragon; background in general is tiny dots; torque has edge of smooth silver; connecting piece is covered in wrapped wire; connecting piece has a large cone that rests in the very center
title: Torque
